text: Marvel's Luke Cage is an American TV series and the third Netflix series of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The series was created by Cheo Hodari Coker and was on Netflix from September 30, 2016 to June 22, 2018. Mike Colter stars in the series as Luke Cage, returning from Jessica Jones. The series was produced by Marvel Television. Colter later returned as the character in The Defenders (2017). == Cast and characters == * Mike Colter as Luke Cage * Mahershala Ali as Cornell "Cottonmouth" Stokes * Simone Missick as Mercedes "Misty" Knight * Theo Rossi as Hernan "Shades" Alvarez * Erik LaRay Harvey as Willis Stryker / Diamondback * Rosario Dawson as Claire Temple * Alfre Woodard as Mariah Stokes-Dillard * Gabrielle Dennis as Tilda Johnson * Mustafa Shakir as John McIver / Bushmaster * Jessica Henwick as Colleen Wing * Finn Jones as Danny Rand / Iron Fist * Stephen Rider as Blake Tower == Episodes == == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:Netflix original series Category:2016 American television series debuts Category:2018 American television series endings Category:Superhero television shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Luke Cage (TV series)
